moduleInfo.moduleDesc: Module for zoro, you can make it defaults to dubs by adding DUB to the end of the preferedServer and preferedDownloadServer variables.
moduleInfo.searchPlaceHolder: If you want to search for a random anime, just type 'random'
moduleInfo.changelog: Added a recaptcha token verification so everything goes smoother for the module
